content.title:
siyuan-note /

      siyuan---📕 SiYuan is a local-first personal knowledge management system, supports fine-grained block-level reference, and Markdown WYSIWYG. 思源笔记是一款本地优先的个人知识管理系统， 支持细粒度块级引用和 Markdown 所见即所得。Roadmap https://github.com/orgs/siyuan-note/projects/1

n3r4zzurr0 /

      svg-spinners---A collection of 24 x 24 dp SVG spinners!

TheAlgorithms /

      Python---All Algorithms implemented in Python

GitHubDaily /

      GitHubDaily---坚持分享 GitHub 上高质量、有趣实用的开源技术教程、开发者工具、编程网站、技术资讯。A list cool, interesting projects of GitHub.

mbrlabs /

      Lorien---Infinite canvas drawing/whiteboarding app for Windows, Linux and macOS. Made with Godot.

asim /

      go-micro---A Go microservices framework

youngyangyang04 /

      leetcode-master---《代码随想录》LeetCode 刷题攻略：200道经典题目刷题顺序，共60w字的详细图解，视频难点剖析，50余张思维导图，支持C++，Java，Python，Go，JavaScript等多语言版本，从此算法学习不再迷茫！🔥🔥 来看看，你会发现相见恨晚！🚀

The-Japan-DataScientist-Society /

      100knocks-preprocess---データサイエンス100本ノック（構造化データ加工編）

nestjs /

      nest---A progressive Node.js framework for building efficient, scalable, and enterprise-grade server-side applications on top of TypeScript & JavaScript (ES6, ES7, ES8) 🚀

redis /

      redis---Redis is an in-memory database that persists on disk. The data model is key-value, but many different kind of values are supported: Strings, Lists, Sets, Sorted Sets, Hashes, Streams, HyperLogLogs, Bitmaps.

dotnet-presentations /

      dotnet-maui-workshop---A full day workshop (.NET MAUI Workshop in a Box) on how to build apps with .NET MAUI for iOS, Android, macOS, and Windows

pmndrs /

      zustand---🐻 Bear necessities for state management in React

awesome-selfhosted /

      awesome-selfhosted---A list of Free Software network services and web applications which can be hosted on your own servers

brave-people /

      Dev-Event---🎉🎈 개발자 {웨비나, 컨퍼런스, 해커톤} 행사를 알려드립니다. [with 남송리 삼번지]

SwifterSwift /

      SwifterSwift---A handy collection of more than 500 native Swift extensions to boost your productivity.

prometheus /

      client_golang---Prometheus instrumentation library for Go applications

SmiteshP /

      nvim-navic---Simple winbar/statusline plugin that shows your current code context

EbookFoundation /

      free-programming-books---📚 Freely available programming books

ThreeDotsLabs /

      watermill---Building event-driven applications the easy way in Go.

quarkusio /

      quarkus---Quarkus: Supersonic Subatomic Java.

sheepla /

      pingu---🐧ping command but with pingu

wiz-sec /

      cloud-middleware-dataset---

microsoft /

      winget-cli---Windows Package Manager CLI (aka winget)

sindresorhus /

      awesome---😎 Awesome lists about all kinds of interesting topics

actions /

      virtual-environments---GitHub Actions virtual environments
